msg.name: title
msg.desc: Title of the gadget.

msg.name: description
msg.desc: Description about the gadget.

messagebundle.msg: Trippy gadget helps you plan a trip with your friends using Lonely Planet's award winning content

msg.name: feedback_link
msg.desc: Link to provide feedback and suggestions about application.

msg.name: author_email
msg.desc: Email address of the developer.

msg.name: search_trips
msg.desc: Label for search text box in map area.

msg.desc: Label for show all trips link in canvas view.

msg.desc: Label for resending request.

msg.desc: Label for showing waiting state while fetching data.

msg.name: where_visit
msg.desc: Label for prompting user about destination.

messagebundle.msg: Where do you want to visit?

msg.name: egLocation
msg.desc: Label for suggesting trip destinations to user.

msg.desc: Label for creating a trip.

msg.name: to
msg.desc: Label for text To used for referring the sender in email dialog box.

msg.desc: Label for 'Create custom item' button in canvas view.

msg.desc: label for button in Days dialog in canvas view.

msg.desc: Label for adding an item to trip add item dialog box in canvas view.

msg.desc: Label for showing tip for dragging item.

messagebundle.msg: Drag any result directly over to your trip

msg.name: cancel
msg.desc: Label for cancel button.

msg.desc: Label for OK button.

msg.desc: Warning message to be displayed when new trip duration is less than old trip duration.

messagebundle.msg: <b>Warning!<b/> some items may be moved to unscheduled section.

msg.name: invalid_duration
msg.desc: Error message to be displayed when entered duration is invalid.

msg.desc: Error message to be displayed when entered trip duration is greater than 60.

msg.name: edit_item
msg.desc: Label for editing items.

msg.name: save
msg.desc: Label for showing save text on button.

msg.desc: Label added while adding unscheduled item.

msg.desc: Label added while adding scheduled item.

msg.desc: Label for setting trip dates.

msg.name: trip_name
msg.desc: Label shown before trip name.

msg.name: date
msg.desc: Label for showing date header.

msg.name: location
msg.desc: Label for showing location header.

msg.name: view_all_trips
msg.desc: Label for view all trips link in home view.

msg.name: server_error
msg.desc: Label to show when server error occurs.

msg.name: feedback
msg.desc: Label for showing feedback and ideas link on the Home view.

msg.name: create
msg.desc: Label for create button to create a new trip.

msg.name: no_trips
msg.desc: Text to shown when no trips are found in the gadget.

msg.name: invalid_loc
msg.desc: Error message to be displayed when the trip location is invalid .

msg.desc: Error message to be displayed if numeric character found in trip name.

msg.name: no_data_found
msg.desc: Error message to be displayed when no results are retrieved from lonely planet.

msg.desc: Error message to be displayed when no results are retrieved from lonely planet for a category.

msg.name: not_authenticate
msg.desc: Error message to be displayed when user is not authenticated to use the service.

msg.name: delete_this_item
msg.desc: label for button using to delete the item.

msg.name: delete_item_confirm
msg.desc: Label on the prompt Message to be displayed while deleting item.

messagebundle.msg: Are you sure that you want to delete the item?

msg.name: delete_trip_confirm
msg.desc: Label on the prompt Message to be displayed while deleting trip.

messagebundle.msg: Are you sure that you want to delete the trip?

msg.name: delete_trip
msg.desc: Label for deleting a trip.

msg.name: item_deleted
msg.desc: Message to be displayed when an item is deleted successfully.

msg.name: trip_deleted
msg.desc: Message to be displayed when a trip is deleted successfully.

msg.name: trip_created
msg.desc: Message to be displayed when a trip is created successfully.

msg.name: item_delete_err
msg.desc: Message to be displayed when there is a server problem while deleting an item.

messagebundle.msg: Server Problem: Item ({name}) is not deleted.

msg.name: trip_delete_err
msg.desc: Message to be displayed when there is a server problem while deleting a trip.

messagebundle.msg: Server Problem: Trip ({name}) is not deleted.

msg.name: trip_create_err
msg.desc: Message to be displayed when there is a server problem while creating a trip.

messagebundle.msg: Server Problem: Trip ({name}) is not created.

msg.name: item_add_err
msg.desc: Message to be displayed when there is a server problem while adding an item.

msg.name: item_added
msg.desc: Message to be displayed when an item is added successfully.

msg.name: updated_name
msg.desc: Message to show when trip name is updated successfully.

msg.name: tripname_update_err
msg.desc: Message to be displayed when there is a server problem while updating trip name.

messagebundle.msg: Server Problem: Trip name is not updated.

msg.name: itemdates_update_err
msg.desc: Message to be displayed when there is a server problem while updating item schedule.

messagebundle.msg: Server Problem: Item ({name}) is not scheduled.

msg.name: itemdates_updated
msg.desc: Message to be displayed when item schedule is updated successfully.

msg.name: triploc_update_err
msg.desc: Message to be displayed when there is a server problem while updating trip location.

messagebundle.msg: Server Problem: Trip location is not updated.

msg.name: triploc_updated
msg.desc: Message to be displayed when trip location is updated successfully.

msg.name: allitems_updated
msg.desc: Message to be displayed when all trip items are successfully updated.

msg.desc: Label for create new item in dialog box.

msg.desc: Label for delete item header in dialog box.

msg.desc: Label for trip name header in delete item dialog box.

msg.desc: Message when server is not able to send email successfully.

msg.desc: Label for send mail button.

msg.desc: Message to be displayed when mail is sent successfully.

msg.desc: Error message to shown for wrong email id.

msg.desc: Message to shown when sending mail to more than specified limit.

msg.desc: Label for how many email messages are allowed.

msg.desc: Label when no results are found for the given keyword or Lonenly planet search item.

msg.desc: Message to be displayed when no item is added in the trip.

messagebundle.msg: No item found for the current trip

msg.desc: Message to be displayed when no scheduled item is added in the trip.

messagebundle.msg: No scheduled item found for the current trip

msg.desc: Message to be displayed when no unscheduled item is added in the trip.

msg.desc: Label of create trip button in home view.

msg.desc: Label to be used for details link for trip item on the map.

msg.desc: Label to be used for photo and video link of trip item on the map.

msg.desc: Error message if date is empty.

msg.desc: Error message if specified date is out of range.

msg.desc: Error message if location not found.

msg.desc: Label to Include map checkbox while printing the trip itinerary.

msg.desc: Label to be used for Print dialog title.

msg.name: edit_trip_name
msg.desc: Edit trip name dialog title.

msg.name: date_expired
msg.desc: Error message if dates are chosen before the current date.

messagebundle.msg: Trip dates cannot be less than the current date.

msg.name: dragme
msg.desc: Label for Add me to your trip link in canvas view for manually adding an item to the trip.

msg.desc: Heading for add your vote section for voting an item.

msg.desc: Comments for add your vote section for voting an item.

msg.desc: Label for vote button.

msg.desc: Text for thumbs up.

msg.desc: Text for thumbs down.

msg.name: activity
msg.desc: Message for activity.

msg.name: activity_error
msg.desc: Error message for activity.

msg.name: owner
msg.desc: Label of owner.

msg.name: no_empty_dates
msg.desc: Error message for empty date fields.

messagebundle.msg: Trip dates cant be empty. Please enter valid date.

msg.name: desc_error_message
msg.desc: Error message to show to user if description exceeds 200 characters.

messagebundle.msg: Description field length can be max of 200 chars.

msg.name: item_addr
msg.desc: Label for item address.

msg.name: no_sensitive
msg.desc: To display to user message that on enabling opensocial feature no sensitive information will be shared.

messagebundle.msg: Trippy uses a new feature provided by Google called Open Social which allows you to make and share travel plans online with friends. To start, you need to adjust this gadget's settings to enable it to access some of your profile information (your name, etc). No sensitive information will be shared.

msg.name: user_not_signed_in
msg.desc: Message if user is not signed in.

messagebundle.msg: iGoogle Trippy uses a new feature provided by Google called Open Social which allows you to plan your travel, online with friends. To start planning, please sign in to enable access.

msg.name: already_signin
msg.desc: Message to show to user to refresh browser.

messagebundle.msg: If you are already signed in, please refresh the page in your browser to restore your access.

msg.name: os_is_new
msg.desc: Message that opensocial is new and may have some bugs.

messagebundle.msg: Open Social is new, and there may still be some bugs in it. If it's not working for you after you followed these directions, please

msg.name: os_not_avail
msg.desc: Message when opensocial is unavailable.

messagebundle.msg: iGoogle Trippy makes use of a new technology called Open Social which allows you to plan your travel online with your friends. Open Social features are being released to the public as the technology comes online â€” but right now, it looks like this feature is not available in your locale at this time. Please check back at a later date.

msg.name: enable_os
msg.desc: Message to enable opensocial preference.

messagebundle.msg: Click it, and in the form that appears just check the boxes and save. You should be ready to go!

msg.name: up_button
msg.desc: message to enable opensocial preference from top.

messagebundle.msg: Up top, you should see a button like this:

msg.name: name_addr_empty
msg.desc: Error message if field is empty.

messagebundle.msg: Either name or address field is empty.

msg.name: map_not_loaded
msg.desc: Error message to show incase map is not loaded properly.

messagebundle.msg: Map is not load properly. Kindly refresh the browser.

msg.name: let_us_know
msg.desc: Label to let developers know about issues faced.

msg.name: welcome_igoogle
msg.desc: Welcome message.

msg.name: voting_success
msg.desc: Message to show if voting is successful.

msg.name: auth_error
msg.desc: Message to shown on authentication error.

msg.desc: Message to show when no trip item is found while mailing.

msg.desc: Message string to show for getting reviews.

msg.desc: Label for vote up.
